title: Washington Park, Richmond
text: Washington Park is a neighborhood in <a href="Richmond%2C%20Virginia">Richmond, Virginia</a>'s <a href="North%20Side%20%28Richmond%2C%20Virginia%29">North Side</a>. The neighborhood lies west of the <a href="Forest%20Lawn%20Cemetery%20%28Richmond%2C%20Virginia%29">Forest Lawn Cemetery</a> and the <a href="Richmond%20International%20Raceway">Richmond International Raceway</a>.
